DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded yes/no/not applicable indicator that asks about the patient/participant's age.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: A period or stage in life, usually stated in years since birth.

Concepts.definition: How long something has existed; elapsed time since birth.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Is patient greater than or eq
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient greater than or equal to 18 years old?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient greater than or equal to 18 years old on the day of consent?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient greater than 18 years old?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient greater than or equal to 18 and less than or equal to 70 years old?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient greater than or equal 6 years old if treated at the NIH Clinical Center (greater than or equal to 18 years old if treated at other participating sites)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient greater than or equal to 16 years old?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient greater than or equal to 3 years of age?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient greater than or equal to 15 years old?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient greater than or equal to 12 years old?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 10
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient greater than or equal to 18 years old on the day of signing informed consent?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 11
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient greater than or equal to 18 years old at the time of consent?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 12
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient greater than or equal to 6 years old if treated at the NIH Clinical Center (greater than or equal to 18 years old if treated at other participating sites)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 13
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient male and greater than or equal to 18 years old?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 14
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient greater than or equal to 14 years old at time of screening?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 15
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient female, greater than or equal to 18 years old and is not of child bearing potential?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 16
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient greater than or equal to 12 years old for NF1 mutant MPNST or greater than or equal to 18 years old for all other cohorts?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 17
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient greater than 18 years old for all cohorts?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 18
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient, a woman who is not of child bearing potential or a man, greater than or equal to 18 years old?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 20
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient greater than or equal to 60 years old?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 19
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient greater than or equal to 18 years old and less than or equal to 75 years old?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 21
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient greater than or equal to 2 years old?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 23
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient greater than or equal to 12 months and less than or equal to 25 years old at the time of Part 1 informed consent/assent?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 25
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient greater than or equal to 2 years of age, if registered at the NCI Clinical Center or greater than or equal to 12 years of age if at other participating sites?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 26
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient greater than or equal to 13 years old?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 24
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient greater than or equal to 12 months and less than or equal to 25 years old at the time of Part 2 informed consent/assent?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 27
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient less than or equal to 40 years old?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 31
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient greater than or equal to 18 years old and less than 75 years old on the day informed consent is signed?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 22
ReferenceDocuments.description: If enrolled to the atezolizumab monotherapy arm, is patient greater than or equal to 2 years of age?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 29
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient greater than or equal to 18 and less than or equal to 39 years old at time of enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 28
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient greater than or equal to 18 years?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 30
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient a woman who is greater than or equal to 18 years old?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 33
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient between 18-65 years of age at the time of signing the Informed Consent Form (ICF) and meets study requirements?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 32
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient greater than or equal to 2 or less than 18 years old if enrolled on Arm A or greater than or equal to 2 or less than or equal to 35 years old if enrolled on ARM B?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 34
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient an adult greater than or equal to 18 years or child/adolescent greater than or equal to 12 years to 17 years with a BSA greater than or equal to 1.5 m2?
